response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I understand that it might also resonate deeply with you. I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, making it an exceptional deal for someone as discerning as yourself. I trust that you will appreciate not only the financial savings but also the opportunity to own something truly special. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
